name: Delta (itch) (Carlos Pedroso)
description:
Delta is a mobile game prototype made as a final project in 2016. The game never took off because it lacked originality and it was not fun. The main reason for making it was so I could try Unity and learn more about mobile game development.

In this prototype, you can play endless mode and the first 15 levels.

Left Click / Space - Move

Esc - Go Back
